Third event in our "Scientists in Sacramento" series. Before our all-expenses-paid trip to the California Statehouse, get feedback on your preparation from a panel of experts. Participation in this event is required to join our trip to Sacramento on January 14.

<b>Speakers</b>  
Amiee Alden (Director of Local and State Gov't Relations at UCSF), Ben Rubin, (Director of Industry Partnerships in Precision Medicine at UCSF and former CCST STP Fellow)
